Body: When I try to install an app that is 13 mb it is downloaded but when the part of the installation comes it can't be installed it says I don't have enough space. I tried downloading the apk file of that application and still I downloaded it successfuly and I couldn't install it because it said i don't have enough memory even if I have 250mb. I am using Lg L Fino and It is rooted. Please help if you know how. I appreciate all of your answers and I will give you more infromations if needed. Thanks in advance!
